Symptoms Of Current Outbreak Report Positive Case Exposures Now Sick Change Status Your Current Status is Symptoms Status Statistics Confirmation Number From your test results Enter the confirmation number provided If Smartphones with this app are in close Proximity,this Interaction will be recorded on your device. No of People You have been Exposed to Now well Change Status Number of Cases You have experienced Number of people you have Exposed
// Symptoms CoronaVirus Coomon Symptoms : Loss of taste or smell,Nasal congestion, Conjunctivitis,Sore throat,Headache,Muscle or joint pain, Different types of skin rash,Nausea or vomitting,Diarrhea,Chills or dizziness Severe Symptoms : Shortness of breath,Loss of appetite,Confusion,Persistent pain or pressure in the chest,High body temperature(above 38 c) TuberCulosis Ebola Symptoms: fever (greater than 101.5°F), severe headache, muscle pain, weakness, diarrhea, vomiting, stomach pain, and unexplained bleeding or bruising. Diptheria Early Symptoms : sore throat and fever Severe Symptoms: enlarged lymph nodes (swollen glands),skin lesions that may be painful, red, and swollen Common Symptoms : weakness or fatigue,no appetite,chills,fever Severe Symptoms : Cough with Sputum and blood at times,Chest pains,Weakness,Weight loss Fever Night sweats Flu (Influenza) Common Symptoms : Fever Aches (muscle, body, and headaches) Chills Tiredness (fatigue) Sudden onset Cough, runny or stuffy nose, and/or sore throat Severe Symptoms : Vomiting and diarrhea (more common in children than adults) Cholera Common Symptoms : profuse watery diarrhea, sometimes described as “rice-water stools” vomiting Severe Symptoms : leg cramps restlessness or irritability,dry mucous membranes low blood pressure, Severe dehydration can cause death
